import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import NavBlock from './NavBlock' import CurrentWeather from './CurrentWeather' const API_KEY = 'a43370d07c332057a138f54300a5a38a' const images = { 'Clouds': clouds, 'Haze': mist, 'Mist': mist, 'Clear': clear, 'Rain': rain, 'Snow': snow, } export default function App() { const [location, setLocation] = useState('') fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?=${location}units=metric&appid=${API_KEY}`) . return (
) }
